main event: On August 15, 1956, a civilian observed an unidentified flying object in the sky at Yellow Springs, Ohio, which moved vertically at high speed and hovered briefly before disappearing.
interesting points: The object moved vertically at a high rate of speed for a distance of 100 ft.,The object hovered for approximately 1 to 1.5 minutes,No sound was heard during the observation,The total duration of the sighting was 2-3 minutes,The object was reported as a single entity with no visible shape data.
